projects: [{"title":"Face-authorization using OpenCv pre-trained classifiers","start_date":"Jul 2023","end_date":"Sep 2023","description":"Face authorization program using openCV and deepFace library,basically designed to detect faces enclosed in rectangles capturing image during runtime using WebCam. Same thing can be extended to give authorization or detection upon a object image."},{"title":"Inventory Backend Application which exposes basic crud services","start_date":"May 2021","end_date":"Jul 2021","description":"The application runs on Spring Boot and uses H2 db, internally using jpa repository it make changes in the database. The application exposes basic REST services to perform CRUD operations on database. The application can be extended to connect to different db and be deployed in cloud platform to make it more scalable and usable. This is just a sample, the same behaviour can be extended to perform other actions using normal REST MAPPING provided by spring boot."},{"title":"IMPACT PREDICTION OF SPACE DEBRIS FALLING ON SURFACE OF EARTH USING FINITE ELEMENT","start_date":"Jul 2019","end_date":"Dec 2019","description":"The project lies around impact prediction from the collision of two bodies which might depend upon various factors such as speed, Material Property of the bodies , projectile’s direction, etc. The project results aim to find an application in the prediction of damage that may be incurred from the collision of space debris when entering the Earth and vice-versa that is by studying the damage prediction of properties of that the body entering earth and colliding with it might possess .The solution to the problem lies in the Study of data. It can be used to obtain a feasible prediction model but prior to model construction, the features that might influence the impact should be studied and the factors that can project the impact such as the diameter of the hole, the velocity of the particle prior to the collision, etc. The basic knowledge about the debris properties and its correlation with the materials is a must for any prediction technique to work. Following which the steps can be taken to obtain data of the collision"},{"title":"Studying the effect of various factors on Housing Prices in King County using Hypothesis Testing and Linear Regression","start_date":"Dec 2018","end_date":"Feb 2019","description":"Here, dataset is taken from harvard and various factor and their effect on housing pricesof King County was studies by me. R MarkDown file used for publishing results on Rpub platform.Dependancy of one factor on another can be shown by plotting them"}]
